segments.text: I see a little girl standing next to the boy, looking up at him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, waiting to receive a cookie from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture shows that she's really eager to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's his sister or just a friend.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be cooperating with him, helping to keep watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in her eyes as she waits for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, but she's definitely part of this little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught by the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks like she's really enjoying this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at her enthusiasm and innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on the boy and the cookie jar, nothing else seems to matter.
segments.speaker: PAR
